org.eclipse.keyple.core.plugin

Interface WaitForCardRemovalDuringProcessing

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ObservableReader, ObservableReaderNotifier, Reader

    public interface WaitForCardRemovalDuringProcessing
extends ObservableReaderNotifier
    Interface to be implemented by readers able to detect a card removal during processing, between two APDU commands.

    A typical example of readers conforming to this mode of operation are PC/SC type readers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservableReader

        ObservableReader.NotificationMode, ObservableReader.PollingMode, ObservableReader.ReaderObserver

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader
